Datadog dash conference tomorrow !

$DDOG was hinted a few weeks before official PR. Look closely into PR. Who is hinted?? $CRWDTruContext ingests ANY data in its raw and native format, including PCAP, Netflow, Nessus, Splunk data, Crowdstrike, etc., making it easier for users to see machine data and find new insights - Users can now leverage TruContext to understand cyber threat data in real-time, enabling decisions to be made with confidence.
Current market cap $44 billion - lets see if they make so much in revenue...LOL
New all time high today. Bad news for all the bears on strong volume. I get the PE issue but I could say the same for ZS,CRWD, and others. Sometimes momentum wins
Datadog reached an all time high at 162.05
Anyone know what’s going on today?
Datadog reached an all time high at 167.00
super blowout earnings on 11/4
going to 150 before correcting

Since late 2019 $DDOG CTO Alexis Lê-Quôc @alq took $677M in stock based compensation due to $DDOG grossly inflated stock valuation. Put that in perspective, $DDOG only did $603M in 2020 revenue. CEO @oliveur close second taking $500M. What's wrong with this picture? FOMO/MOMO. Oh and by the way the CTO has now sold ALL of his shares.
Gone beyond imagination. Be safe. This is next shoe to drop after e-commerce players. Covid gone. Reality hits internet infrastructure.
Insiders are selling big time

09:26 AM EDT, 10/15/2021 (MT Newswires) -- David M Obstler, Chief Financial Officer, on October 12, 2021, sold 15,000 shares in Datadog ( DDOG Loading... Loading... ) for $2,167,191. Following the Form 4 filing with the SEC, Obstler has control over a total of 175,391 shares of the company, with 175,391 shares held directly. The market value of the direct and indirect holding, based on the transaction price, is approximately $25,601,579.09:25 AM EDT, 10/15/2021 (MT Newswires) -- Olivier Pomel, Director, Chief Executive Officer, on October 12, 2021, sold 218,208 shares in Datadog ( DDOG ) for $32,217,157. Following the Form 4 filing with the SEC, Pomel has control over a total of 244,908 shares of the company, with 244,043 shares held directly and 865 controlled indirectly. The market value of the direct and indirect holding, based on the transaction price, is approximately $37,077,798.SEC Filing:https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1561550/000120919121060501/xslF345X03/doc4.xml
insiders usually sell 45 million in stock before good news?
time to buy some DDOG again!!
will run up towards earnings date......in early november

09:21 AM EDT, 10/11/2021 (MT Newswires) -- Alexis Le-quoc, Director, President & CTO, on October 06, 2021, sold 314,304 shares in Datadog ( DDOG Loading... Loading... ) for $45,149,355. Following the Form 4 filing with the SEC, Le-quoc has control over a total of 175,384 shares of the company, with 174,764 shares held directly and 620 controlled indirectly. The market value of the direct and indirect holding, based on the transaction price, is approximately $25,625,356.
IBD has been giving DDOG a lot of good press.
Absolute bullish trend for this stock that is quite indomitable considering the correction in the Nasdaq over the last 5 weeks.
